review: Truly one of the best investments I've made this year. I'm loving all the features this device provides.
author: Peter Y Mun

review: I LOVE this thing. Makes a great partner to my iPad with Netflix and YouTube. It gets frustrating that I can't chrome cast my Amazon prime on my iPad, but I can stream anything and everything my my laptop. Looses connection once in a blue moon, but works great!
author: ladaigs

review: Works great for Netflix and very little lag in response
author: kelloggs23

review: Good for travel when staying in hotel rooms
author: Jess Siegrist
